programme.title: Titipo The Little Train
programme.desc: Diesel gets an autograph by a superstar, which is a dream come true for him. Determined to keep that autograph forever, he refuses to get washed and get dirtier day by day. He starts to even smell. His friends beg Diesel to wash, but he's just too stubborn.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Who's that hopping into the garden? Why, it's a yellow-footed rock-wallaby - and its baby! The Junior Rangers hightail it to Australia to send mother and child home, but will a couple of flat tires throw a spanner in the works? A vervet monkey shows up as an uninvited guest to one of Leo's picnics. The Junior Rangers head to the savannah to bring the monkey home, but the trip takes a nasty turn when they fall into an animal trap.

programme.title: Super Wings : Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett and Jett Pet deliver a truffle detector to a girl named Sandrine in France. It's to help her and her pet pig, Snouty, who she's been training to find truffles. He hasn't quite got the hang of it yet. A trip into the forest to test out the new detector quickly turns tricky when Snouty and JP disappear in a maze of underground tunnels. Jett calls for help to save them, and the underground rescue leads them to the lost pets and the biggest truffle ever!

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: Three baby Monumential turtles hatched and they're the size of city blocks! The playful babies accidentally sink a fishing trawler! Can the Nektons wrangle these creatures before they sink even more ships?

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Bearbarian has disappeared. Axel finds him in the backyard, but his companion is now working with... Orangutank?

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: In wrestling class Coach teaches the class about being a Face or a Heel. They must all decide what they will be. At school, Iz tries out being bad while Bob is desperate to be good. It all goes horribly wrong and they end up in the principal's office!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger's collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, it's a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magician's hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magician's act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: OddBods
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: In this episode, our Try-ers have been tasked to turn each other into original superheroes using face paint! Will they fulfil their superhero fantasy?

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: The brave archeologist cat Quatermain is looking for Pharaoh Tutankhamon's treasure, and the Buffycats are ready to join his pawesome adventure! They have to collect ancient artifacts that will lead them to a mysterious treasure room...

programme.title: Power Rangers Super Beast Morphers
programme.desc: Following his first major defeat, Evox has possessed Mayor Daniels and plots to finish what he started with the help of Scrozzle and his new generals, Robo-Blaze and Robo-Roxy. However, once they learn of his return, the Beast Morpher Rangers jump back into action to stop him once-and-for all.

programme.title: Sky Kids
programme.desc: Two boys from a small town find their courage tested when they accidentally stow away aboard an airplane owned by the mob.

programme.title: 31st SEA Games: Daily Action At The Games
programme.desc: (Live).

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore
programme.desc: Top brass from DBS bank visits the MasterChef Kitchen and highlights the environmental havoc caused by food waste. To encourage zero waste cooking, they offer a cash prize to the home cook who can create the most delicious dish with food scraps rescued from restaurant waste bins. The bottom six are then thrown a curve ball through a Hidden Pairs challenge. Guest Chef Nurul tests the contestants with ten of the strangest ingredient pairings you could ever imagine.

programme.title: 31st SEA Games: Today At The Games
programme.desc: Hosted by Edward Russell and Kelly Latimer, "Today at the Games" features a daily round-up of Team Singapore's performance at the Games.

programme.title: The Magic of Belle Isle
programme.desc: Monty Wildhorn, an alcoholic novelist of Westerns, has lost his drive. His nephew pushes him to summer in quiet Belle Isle. He begrudgingly befriends a newly single mom and her 3 girls who help him find the inspiration to write again.

programme.title: Laureus World Sports Awards
programme.desc: The Laureus World Sports Awards is an annual award ceremony honouring individuals and teams from the world of sports along with sporting achievements throughout the year.

programme.title: Glastonbury
programme.desc: The highlights show features performances not only from the history-making Pyramid stage headliners - Stormzy, The Killers and The Cure - but from a huge range of artists including Miley Cyrus, Billie Eilish, George Ezra, Vampire Weekend, Sheryl Crow, Liam Gallagher, Kylie, and Christine and the Queens.

programme.title: Cirque du Soleil - LUZIA
programme.desc: The iconic Cirque du Soleil brings Mexico vividly to life in this awe-inspiring stage show.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Wa-Cheew! Rise Of A Kung-Fu Chef
programme.desc: Remy Chew has always dreamed of being a celebrity chef like Harry Lim. After being humiliated by Harry in a cooking showdown, Remy finds a secret cooking manual - The 18 Heavens. Will the secrets of Kung-Fu cooking help Remy to finally beat the famous Harry in a final showdown?

programme.title: Lil Wild
programme.desc: Dil has gone viral much to the chagrin of resident social media star Kokeko! Meanwhile, Suzie must convince the gang to play by the rules so her head ranger will pass her probation.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: The Imp has joined Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy to form a super team, but poor Mousie is feeling left out! When all of the round objects in Ollipolis are mysteriously transformed into pentagonal blocks, go cart wheels won't spin, and soccer balls won't bounce. Meanwhile, Mousie keeps mentioning a strange sound that no one else can hear.

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom Specials
programme.desc: It's Grabbleapple Harvest season! True needs to convince Glummy Glooma to bring the cloudy fall, or the Grabbleapple trees won't be able to have their winter nap.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends Special 3: The Royal Engine
programme.desc: Thomas and Sir Topham Hatt are invited to London for a royal celebration!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: When a fancy new ice cream machine comes to Chuggington, Frostini feels left behind and goes in search of his true passion.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: Captain Redbeeard is behaving strangely and only a special berry juice made by Parrot can calm him down, but he's missing! Tim searches for Parrot while the others try to recreate the juice. Pig and Panda are making a monster movie and Tim wants to be the heroic star. However, he keeps getting other roles while he watches the rest do exciting things. Will Time get his moment to shine?

programme.title: Maya the Bee - The Honey Games
programme.desc: When enthusiastic but headstrong Maya loses her role as hive ambassador, she must prove herself as a great team player by leading a group of misfit bugs to win the annual Honey Games.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.

programme.desc: (Live) Catch our Team Singapore athletes in action each day as they show their spirit and character at the 31st SEA Games in Vietnam.

programme.title: Wonderstruck
programme.desc: Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

programme.title: Blinded By The Light
programme.desc: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films & Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: American Music Awards
programme.desc: The world's biggest artists and pop culture icons came together to honor idols, newcomers and record-breakers at the "2021 American Music Awards".

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.desc: Straight From The Heart is a three-part anthology of quintessential slices of Singapore set in the heartland. A dark comedy about a serial pet killer on the loose, a poignant tale about two sisters and a story about neighbours who become friends - all the stories are based on written work by Singapore's well-known writers - all set and inspired by the HDB heartland.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: Dr. Shaun Murphy's unique ability to relate to a patient isolated by an immune deficiency yields an unexpected result. Meanwhile, Dr. Claire Browne, Dr. Morgan and Dr. Marcus treat a 12-year-old patient who is about to become blind, and tension builds between Dr. Neil and Dr. Audrey Lim.

programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

Maths could not be any more delicious.

Michelle Tay and May Phua faces their worst nightmare when Belinda brings one to a bullfrog farm, and the other to a feast of frog cuisines.
